item.title: Kat add a quote by Carson McCullers
item.description: "How can the dead be truly dead when they still live in the souls of those who are left behind?" -- Carson McCullers

item.title: Kat add a quote by Philip Roth
item.description: "There is truth and then again there is truth. For all that the world is full of people who go around believing they've got you or your neighbor figured out, there really is no bottom to what is not known. The truth about us is endless. As are the lies." -- Philip Roth

item.title: Kat add a quote by Junot Díaz
item.description: "I guess it's true what they say: if you wait long enough everything changes." -- Junot Díaz

item.title: Kat add a quote by Jim Geoghan
item.description: "When we fall in love with someone there's a moment when we take a picture of that person, an emotional snapshot, that we carry with us forever. If we're lucky, if we're very, very lucky, the person we fall in love with will always resemble that snapshot." -- Jim Geoghan
